text: 2.14 Kis 19.5, Lo 4.20, 7.6, 14.2, Sng 130.8, Ese 37.23, Gal 1.4, 1 Pi 2.9 Ne binɨb dɨl God ayɨp jɨmñɨl lin agɨl kumak. Chɨnop nen agɨl kumek nɨm, God takaw tɨbɨlɨkɨpun ak kelɨgɨl, binɨb ne ke yɨbɨl okok mɨdobun. Tap tɨmel anɨb okok mɨdupsek wik yokɨlɨg yek, binɨb ne ke yɨbɨl mɨdobun ak, chɨn tap teplep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgun agɨl gos nɨŋɨd gɨnɨgabun.
